name: src/mass_unit.js
toFixed
description: The toFixed() method formats a number using fixed-point notation.

unknown.tagValue: {string} A string representing the given number using fixed-point notation.

params.name: digits
params.description: Optional. The number of digits to appear after the decimal point; this may be a value between 0 and 20, inclusive, and implementations may optionally support a larger range of values. If this argument is omitted, it is treated as 0.

return.description: A string representing the given number using fixed-point notation.

name: isSame
description: Check if current object value is same as given weight.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if same or false is not.

return.description: True if same or false is not.

name: isNotSame
description: Check if current object value is not same as given weight.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} False if same or true if not.

return.description: False if same or true if not.

name: isHeavier
description: Check if current mass is heavier than a given weight.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if current object is heavier or false if not.

return.description: True if current object is heavier or false if not.

name: isLighter
description: Check if current mass is lighter than a given weight.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if current object is lighter or false if not.

return.description: True if current object is lighter or false if not.

name: isEmpty
description: Check if current object is empty.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if current object is empty or false if not.

return.description: True if current object is empty or false if not.

name: src/ounces.js
parseSingleUnit
description: Parse text for single unit weight.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to parse for single unit weight.

params.name: unitType
params.description: Default unit type if no signifier is found.

name: src/pounds.js
parseSingleUnit
description: Parse text for single unit weight.

params.description: Default unit type if no signifier is found.

name: src/weight.js
./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "weight.js",
  "version": "1.4.3",
  "description": "JavaScript classes to convert imperial mass units as well as output and parse as text.",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npx webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "lint": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint --config ./.eslintrc.js ./src",
    "test": "npm run tests",
    "tests": "node ./scripts/tests.js | tap-spec",
    "test:coverage": "npm run tests:coverage",
    "tests:coverage": "npx nyc npm run tests",
    "speed": "npm run performance",
    "performance": "node ./scripts/performance.js",
    "docs": "npm run documentation",
    "documentation": "npx esdoc",
    "example": "node ./scripts/example.js"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "weight",
    "conversion",
    "imperial",
    "pound",
    "ounce"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/MeekLogic/Weight.js"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/MeekLogic/Weight.js/issues"
  },
  "author": "MeekLogic (Tyler Vigario)",
  "license": "GPL-3.0-only",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.2.0",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-publish-markdown-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.10.0",
    "microtime": "^2.1.8",
    "nyc": "^13.1.0",
    "tap-spec": "^5.0.0",
    "tape": "^4.9.1",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^2.0.1",
    "webpack": "^4.27.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "nyc": {
    "include": [
      "**/dist/weight.js"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
